DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , prospective , control , observational study natural history patient dry eye disease .
DOC.brief_title: A Natural History Study Patients With Dry Eye
DOC.criteria: Males least 55 year old female , least 40 year old perimenopausal symptom Baseline OSDI score â‰¥ 13 Patients mild moderate dry eye ( dry eye disease patient ; applicable control group ) Use topical cyclosporine ophthalmic emulsion within 3 month baseline History herpes keratitis varicella zoster keratitis Any history allergic conjunctivitis Temporary permanent occlusion cauterization lacrimal puncta either eye Any anterior segment surgery involve limbal corneal incision ( cataract surgery ) , keratorefractive procedure ( LASIK , LASEK , PRK ) within 12 month baseline , expectation surgery within 2 year Patients know systemic disease Any history corneal transplant
